data.name: Stereo Boy
data.detailed_description:
Stereo Boy is sci-fi adventure featuring mind-bending puzzles, a unique teleportation mechanic, and stunning isometric environments. Help Blit to unravel the mystery of Planet SO-671 and find a way home.

Jump between parallel worlds


Blit, plucky robot astronaut, is marooned on a mysterious planet shattered in half by an ancient catastrophe. Look, it just happens sometimes! Lucky for you, Blit can harness quantum energy to teleport between parallel worlds, making it easy to navigate SO-671’s daunting terrain. It’s also a pretty neat trick at parties.

Puzzles


Stereo Boy is chock-full of interlocking puzzle mechanics, requiring you to use Blit’s teleportation ability in increasingly creative and intricate ways.

It helps to have a ray gun


No mysterious alien planet is complete without some hostile baddies eager to give you a warm welcome. Blit can take them head-on, or dodge them with some crafty cross-dimensional footwork.

Explore a lush, mysterious world


Each of Stereo Boy’s 50+ levels is a unique puzzle box, forming an experience that’s equal parts charming, meditative, and challenging. Collect shards to unlock bonus levels and discover the story behind SO-671’s lost civilization.

data.short_description: Blit, plucky robot astronaut, is marooned on a mysterious planet shattered in half by an ancient catastrophe. Use Blit’s unique teleportation ability to jump between parallel worlds, solve mind-bending puzzles, and find a way home!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 capable card
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.13 High Sierra
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple Metal capable card
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
